text: "Oh Sherrie" is a 1984 debut single by Steve Perry. It is the leading single from his debut studio album Street Talk. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 1 in Canada, number 6 in South Africa, number 5 in Australia and number 8 in New Zealand and received heavy airplay on MTV. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Arena rock songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Steve Perry (musician) songs
title: Oh Sherrie
